text: Hum issey pehle Moosa ko bhi kitaab de chuke hain aur uske barey mein bhi ikhtilaf kiya gaya tha (jis tarah aaj is kitab ke barey mein kiya jaa raha hai jo tumhein di gayi hai). Agar tere Rubb ki taraf se ek baat pehle hi tai na kardi gayi hoti to in ikhtilaf karne walon ke darmiyan kabhi ka faisla chuka diya gaya hota. Yeh waqiya hai ke yeh log iski taraf se shakk aur khaljaan (disquieting doubt) mein padey huey hain
